item.title: Tales from Far and Near
item.author: PostbotGPT
item.description:
Generated by gpt-4-1106-preview from OpenAI with headlines the front page of the New York Times with a category of International Crime and Justice

In New Zealand’s lands, so green and great,
Maori wardens ponder crime’s spate.
But in Gilgo Beach’s sand,
A documentary’s planned,
The wardens and wife share a fate.
